name: NO, THANK YOU!!!
description: A dramatic BL visual novel revolving around a man who lost his memory and a secret organization. The key game mechanics of NTY!!! is "flag" destroying by the will of the player, which dynamically affects the outcome of the story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and up Processor: Pentium III 1GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: VRAM 8MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Pentium 4 1.5GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: VRAM 16MB
